A4.text: Favela (Portuguese: [faˈvɛlɐ]) is an umbrella name for several types of impoverished neighborhoods in Brazil.

A5.text: Cavalcanti, Ana Rosa Chagas(2017). 'Work, Slums, and Informal Settlement Traditions: Architecture of the Favela Do Telegrafo'.
